info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:47PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Rutherford, southeastern Polk, northeastern Greenville, northern Spartanburg and northwestern Cherokee Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 347 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles south of Rutherfordton to 5 miles southeast of Columbus to 14 miles southeast of Hendersonville. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Boiling Springs SC, Landrum, Inman, Mayo, Chesnee, Campobello, Cowpens National Battlefield, Lake Bowen, Lake Robinson and USC Upstate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
